plot: A confirmed bachelor falls in love with the young woman whom he had pawned off on his aunt when she was first put into his custody.
title: Her Ragged Knight
plot_es: A confirmed bachelor falls in love with the young woman whom he had pawned off on his aunt when she was first put into his custody.
plot_en: A confirmed bachelor falls in love with the young woman whom he had pawned off on his aunt when she was first put into his custody.
